alert.note: Alert for Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Custer; Fremont; Rio Grande; Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued November 09 at 2:10PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1000 PM WEDNESDAY UNTIL 800 PM WEDNESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Rio Grande, Alamosa, Conejos, Costilla and eastern portions of Saguache, and western portions of Fremont and Custer counties. Locations include, but are not limited to, Alamosa, Conejos, San Luis, Moffat, Crestone, and Westcliffe. WHEN...1000 PM Wednesday November 09 to 800 PM Wednesday November 09 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Wednesday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by Wednesday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa; Conejos; Costilla; Custer; Fremont; Rio Grande; Saguache
